reminder.title: We Miss You!
reminder.message: It’s been a while since your last visit. Come back and explore what’s new.

offer.title: Exclusive Offer Just for You
offer.message: Enjoy a special offer curated based on your recent usage patterns.

upgrade.title: Level Up Your Experience
upgrade.message: Upgrade your app version or device support for better speed and performance.

survey.title: Help Us Improve
survey.message: Take a short survey to share your thoughts and shape our services.

cashback_incentive.title: Earn Cashback Instantly
cashback_incentive.message: Recharge today and receive instant cashback rewards on your next transaction.

show_loan_education.title: Understand Your Loan Better
show_loan_education.message: Explore your loan repayment options, schedules, and tips to stay on track.

low_balance_alert.title: Balance Running Low?
low_balance_alert.message: Top up now to avoid service interruption.

suggest_savings_plan.title: Smart Saving Starts Here
suggest_savings_plan.message: Switch to a savings plan that suits your budget and usage.

winback_offer.title: We Want You Back!
winback_offer.message: Here’s a limited-time deal to welcome you back to the app.

bill_due_reminder.title: Bill Due Soon
bill_due_reminder.message: Avoid late fees by paying your bill on time.

preapproved_loan_prompt.title: Loan Preapproved for You
preapproved_loan_prompt.message: You’re eligible for a quick loan based on your good repayment behavior.

update_profile_prompt.title: Keep Your Info Fresh
update_profile_prompt.message: Complete your profile to receive more personalized offers.

data_pack_discount_offer.title: Special Data Pack Just for You
data_pack_discount_offer.message: Save more with your personalized discounted data plan.

plan_upgrade_suggestion.title: Upgrade Your Plan
plan_upgrade_suggestion.message: You’ve outgrown your current plan. Switch now for better benefits.

network_feedback_survey.title: Rate Our Network
network_feedback_survey.message: Tell us how we’re doing in your area and help us improve.

suggest_wifi_usage.title: Save Data with Wi-Fi
suggest_wifi_usage.message: Use Wi-Fi for heavy downloads and app updates.

tailored_subscription_bundle.title: Get a Custom Bundle
tailored_subscription_bundle.message: Your usage suggests you’d benefit from a custom subscription pack.

connect_to_customer_support.title: We’re Here to Help
connect_to_customer_support.message: Looks like something’s not right. Our support team is ready to assist.
